metadata.title: PalmBeach Jewelry Yellow Gold-Plated or Platinum-Plated Sterling Silver Marquise Shaped Genuine Emerald and Diamond Accent Ring
features: Main Stone: 1 Marquise Radiant Cut Genuine Green Emerald, .19 carat, 5 mm x 3 mm
Accent Stones: 6 Genuine Emeralds .18 cttw; 2 Genuine Diamonds .01 cttw
Platinum-Plated Sterling Silver; Contains 1.50 grams of Sterling Silver
Measures: 2 mm wide x 2 mm long x 5 mm high; Shank Width: 1.5 mm wide
Includes gift box and drawstring pouch
description: PalmBeach Jewelry exclusive. Queen of green. This marquise-cut emerald ring with bezel-set emerald accents, .38 carat T.W., is enhanced by sparkling diamond accents for additional glitter. 18k gold-plated or platinum-plated sterling silver. (All carat weights are approximate and may vary slightly from those listed.) - 50916RNG
